body:
Migrated out of https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/2495#issuecomment-419636297

Just moving it out not to clutter it further.

I currently get an infinite recursion on a fresh copy of spack `develop` (ccbff6e0cdc1e4e045656a784e28225f416a8ed4) and removed `$HOME/.spack` directory on `. share/spack/setup_env.sh` in Debian 9.5 "stretch".

### Steps to reproduce the issue

See [docker image](https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/9206#issuecomment-420201058) below. Basically, make sure to have a recent version of `ruamel.yaml` on your system.

### Error Message

